channel.title: Emacs on Jack Hayes
channel.description: Recent content in Emacs on Jack Hayes

item.title: Using Org-Mode with Hugo
item.description: Summary This page is a summary of stuff I’ve learnt about using org-mode with Hugo to publish webpages. It is still very much in flux as of <2024-06-28 Fri>. Starting Points I use emacs a fair bit and org-mode a bit so I’m interested in using an org-mode flow. Because I use hugo to generate my website at the moment, use of a package called ox-hugo seemed the most convenient.
